summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoTrails hiking companion app - all backend APIs functional, frontend pages accessible, AI companion working with Gemini integration

ui_bugs.issue: Location permission denied shows error message but doesn't block functionality

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity - all 9 endpoints working
Places search for Yellowstone - returns correct results
Place details page - loads Yellowstone with trails, weather, map
AI companion insight - Gemini integration functional
Journal page - all modes (Plan, Log, Discoveries, Achievements) present
Trail filtering and map display - functional
Onboarding flow - exists with proper navigation
